task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find the instructions to perform subtraction on the Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully perform subtraction operation, you must know about the concept of subtraction.
taskbody.result: The subtraction result is displayed on the screen.
taskbody.example:
You want to subtract 2 from 5. The equation will look like 5-2=3. You enter 5. Press (-). Enter 2. Press (=)
The result 3 appears on the screen.
